name: Capitaine Invaders
description:
A space invaders like game.

Made for #VGLgamejam.

Theme: Arcade

Controls:
  • [z/q/s/d] or [w/a/s/d] to move
  • [space] to shoot
Tools:
  • Engine: Godot 3.3
  • 2D tools: Krita, Gimp, inkscape
  • Audio: LMMS
Musics:
  • Action Chiptunes By Juhani Junkala: https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action
  • Long Away Home by nene: https://opengameart.org/content/long-away-home-8bit
  • Hero Immortal by Trevor Lentz: https://opengameart.org/content/hero-immortal
